titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 281) to amend the National Labor Relations Act to increase the stability of collective bargaining in the building and construction industry.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-157.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 240 - 178 (Record Vote No: 184).

bill.summary: 6/16/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 281 (collective bargaining agreements).
